lead_paragraph: Corey Perry got his ninth career hat trick and the Anaheim Ducks beat the Los Angeles Kings 4-2 on Sunday night to climb within two points of their Southern California rivals for the Pacific Division lead.

headline.print_headline: Perry Gets Hat Trick to Lead Ducks Over Kings 4-2
headline.main: Perry Gets Hat Trick to Lead Ducks Over Kings 4-2

snippet: Corey Perry got his ninth career hat trick and the Anaheim Ducks beat the Los Angeles Kings 4-2 on Sunday night to climb within two points of their Southern California rivals for the Pacific Division lead....
